patthana13.15:5.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:5.2: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:5.3: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:5.4: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasammattaniyato ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:5.5: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.15:6.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:6.2: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:6.3: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:6.4: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:6.5: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.15:7.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.15:8.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.15:9.1: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.15:10.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate ekūnavīsa.
